xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX_description=Properties defined by EXIF, version 2.21 or later
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX_label=EXIF Schema For Extended EXIF Properties

xmp_property.name: SensitivityType
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/SensitivityType_description=Indicates which parameters are used for Photographic Sensitivity.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/SensitivityType_label=Sensitivity Type

xmp_choice.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/SensitivityType/4=Standard output sensitivity (SOS) and recommended exposure index (REI)
$$$/xmp/exifEX/SensitivityType/7=Standard output sensitivity (SOS) and recommended exposure index (REI) and ISO speed

xmp_property.name: StandardOutputSensitivity
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/StandardOutputSensitivity_description=Indicates the standard output sensitivity value of a camera or input device.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/StandardOutputSensitivity_label=Standard Output Sensitivity

xmp_property.name: RecommendedExposureIndex
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/RecommendedExposureIndex_description=Indicates the recommended exposure index value of a camera or input device.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/RecommendedExposureIndex_label=Recommended Exposure Index

xmp_property.name: ISOSpeed
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/ISOSpeed_description=Indicates the ISO speed value of a camera or input device.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/ISOSpeed_label=ISO Speed

xmp_property.name: ISOSpeedLatitudeyyy
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/ISOSpeedLatitudeyyy_description=Indicates the ISO speed latitude yyy value of a camera or input device.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/ISOSpeedLatitudeyyy_label=ISO Speed Latitude yyy

xmp_property.name: ISOSpeedLatitudezzz
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/ISOSpeedLatitudezzz_description=Indicates the ISO speed latitude zzz value of a camera or input device.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/ISOSpeedLatitudezzz_label=ISO Speed Latitude zzz

xmp_property.name: BodySerialNumber
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/BodySerialNumber_description=The serial number of the camera or camera body used to take the photograph.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/BodySerialNumber_label=Body Serial Number

xmp_property.name: LensSpecification
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/LensSpecification_description=notes minimum focal length, maximum focal length, minimum F number in the minimum focal length, and minimum F number in the maximum focal length, which are specification information for the lens that was used in photography.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/LensSpecification_label=Lens Specification

xmp_property.name: LensModel
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/LensModel_description=The lens#{rsquo}s model name and model number.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/LensModel_label=Lens Model

xmp_property.name: LensSerialNumber
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/LensSerialNumber_description=The serial number of the interchangeable lens that was used in photography.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/LensSerialNumber_label=Lens Serial Number

xmp_property.name: InteroperabilityIndex
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exifEX/InteroperabilityIndex_description=Indicates the identification of the Interoperability rule.#{endl}#{quot}R98#{quot} = Indicates a file conforming to R98 file specification of Recommended Exif Interoperability Rules (Exif R 98) or to DCF basic file stipulated by Design Rule for Camera File System (DCF).#{endl}#{quot}THM#{quot} = Indicates a file conforming to DCF thumbnail file stipulated by Design rule for Camera File System.#{endl}#{quot}R03#{quot} = Indicates a file conforming to DCF Option File stipulated by Design rule for Camera File System.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exifEX/InteroperabilityIndex_label=Interoperability Index

xmp_property.name: GPSHPositioningError
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSHPositioningError_description=Indicates the GPS horizontal positioning errors in meters
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSHPositioningError_label=GPS Horizontal Positioning Error
